Title: Intermediate
Description: The document is in a non finalized state.

Title: Final
Description: The document is in a definitive state.

Title: Deactivated
Description: The object being reported has been deactivated.

Title: Reactivated
Description: The object being reported has been reactivated.

Title: Active
Description: The object being reported is currently active.

Title: Available
Description: The volumes (one or more) are available.

Title: Activated
Description: The quantities in the time series have been activated.

Title: In process
Description: The quantities in the time series are in the process of activation (an activation request has been made).

Title: Cancelled
Description: The tender indicated in the time series has been completely cancelled.  In this case the resources are no longer available to all Acquiring System Operators

Title: Ordered
Description: The quantities in the time series are to be activated.

Title: Unavailable
Description: The volumes (one or more) are unavailable.

Title: RGCE agreed
Description: The information has been agreed within the ENTSO-E Regional Group Continental Europe process.

Title: Withdrawn
Description: The information or action has been withdrawn by the submitter.

Title: Creation
Description: The action requested to be carried out is the creation of a new object.

Title: Update
Description: The action requested to be carried out is the update an existing object.

Title: Deactivation
Description: The action requested to be carried out is to deactivate an existing object.

Title: Reactivation
Description: The action requested to be carried out is to reactivate a previously deactivated object.

Title: Preventive
Description: The remedial action is applied to prevent an outage.

Title: Curative
Description: The remedial action is applied after an outage has occurred, in order to maintain the operational security.

Title: Automatic
Description: The remedial action being described is applied by an automation when an outage occurs.

Title: Open
Description: The action being described consists of disconnecting the network element to the transmission network.

Title: Close
Description: The action being described consists of connecting the network element to the transmission network.

Title: Stop
Description: The action being described consists of stopping the production or consumption connected to a network element.

Title: Start
Description: The action being described consists of starting the production or consumption connected to a network element.

Title: Relative
Description: The quantity being described is a relative value to an initial state.

Title: Absolute
Description: The quantity being described is an absolute value.

Title: Curative or preventive
Description: The remedial action can be applied to prevent an outage or after an outage has occurred in order to maintain the operational security.

Title: Unshared bid
Description: Used to indicate that the bid cannot be shared.

Title: Pre Processed
Description: to be process

Title: Substituted
Description: Substituted pre-processing data.

Title: Modified
Description: Modified pre-processing data by RSC or CGMA platform.

Title: Result
Description: Result

Title: Not satisfied
Description: The need described in the time series cannot be satisfied.

Title: Rejected
Description: The document rejected by one or more parties.

Title: Preliminary
Description: Indicative information only for initial planning purposes.

Title: Planned
Description: Is planned.

Title: Confirmed
Description: The status is confirmed.

Title: Shall Be Used
Description: The object defined in the series shall be used.

Title: Could Be Used
Description: The object defined in the series could be used.

Title: Proposed
Description: The status of the information is proposed.

Title: Individual Network Data
Description: The network data provided in the document or series concerns the the unique TSO area describes by the document or series.

Title: Common Network Data
Description: The network data provided in the document or series concerns the whole area describes by the document or series.

Title: Setpoint schedule
Description: The code for the power setpoint mode of operation of the HVDC link.

Title: Proportional external signal
Description: The code for the proportional external signal mode of operation of the HVDC link.

Title: AC emulation
Description: The code for the AC emulation mode of operation of the HVDC link.

Title: Importing element
Description: An importing network element in which the flow measurement enters.

Title: Exporting element
Description: An exporting network element from which the flow measurement comes out.

Title: To be optimized
Description: Describes an element which needs to be optimized by an optimization process.

Title: To be monitored
Description: Describes an element which needs to be monitored by an optimization process.

Title: To be included in capacity calculation
Description: Describes an element which needs to be taken into account in a capacity calculation process.

Title: Relative to previous point in time
Description: The quantity being described is a relative value to a previous point in time.

Title: For flow optimization
Description: Describes an element which needs to be optimized by a flow optimization process.

Title: For voltage optimization
Description: Describes an element which needs to be optimized by a voltage optimization process.

Title: Presolved
Description: Describes an active constraint that limits the exchanges. It is part of the presolved domain.

Title: Not available if linked bid activated
Description: Bid not available if linked bid activated.

Title: Not available if linked bid rejected
Description: Bid not available if linked bid rejected.

Title: Not available for DA if linked bid subject to DA
Description: Bid not available for direct activation if linked bid subject to direct activation.

Title: Not available for DA if linked bid subject to SA
Description: Bid not available for direct activation if linked bid subject to scheduled activation.

Title: Not available if linked bid subject to SA
Description: Bid not available if linked bid subject to scheduled activation.

Title: Not available if linked bid subject to DA
Description: Bid not available if linked bid subject to direct activation.

Title: Primary market
Description: A value is traded for the first time.

Title: Secondary market
Description: A value is traded for the second or next times between two parties.

Title: Interesting
Description: Describes an asset which is considered as interesting.

Title: Relevant
Description: Describes an asset which is considered as relevant.

Title: Conditionally available
Description: Bid available as long as none of the conditions associated with the linked bids materialise.

Title: Conditionally unavailable
Description: Bid unavailable as long as none of the conditions associated with the linked bids materialise.

Title: Available if linked bid activated
Description: Bid available if linked bid activated.

Title: Available if linked bid rejected
Description: Bid available if linked bid rejected.

Title: Available if linked bid subject to SA
Description: Bid available if linked bid subject to scheduled activation.

Title: Available if linked bid subject to DA
Description: Bid available if linked bid subject to direct activation.

Title: Available for DA if linked bid subject to DA
Description: Bid available for direct activation if linked bid subject to direct activation.

Title: Available for DA if linked bid subject to SA
Description: Bid available for direct activation if linked bid subject to scheduled activation.

Title: Delta
Description: Describes a status representing a difference between two values.

Title: Validated
Description: The object or action was validated.

Title: Invalid
Description: The object or action was invalid.

Title: Timed out
Description: The object or action was timed out.
